event.name: Mombasa
event.description: A place worth visiting with loved ones.
Amenities: Pick up and drop off within some areas in Nairobi
Services of professional tour guide driver
Comprehensive game drives for 3 days
Transport in 6 seater luxury open roof tour vans / landcruisers for 3 days
2 nights accommodation in preferred camp / lodge
Meals on Full board for 3 days (meals are Buffet)
